keyMoments.title: Disco Begins the Human Auction
keyMoments.description: Disco, the flamboyant auctioneer, begins the monthly slave auction at the Human Auctioning House, selling the first slave for 600,000 belly.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Disco as the face of the slave trade operation at Sabaody and introduces the auction sequence.

reveals.information: Head auctioneer of the Human Auctioning House
Works for Donquixote Doflamingo's slave trade operation

keyMoments.title: Saint Charlos Arrives at Auction
keyMoments.description: Saint Charlos arrives at the Human Auctioning House with his father Saint Rosward and sister Saint Shalria, seeking to buy slaves.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the most despicable antagonists in the series and sets up the conflict that will lead to Luffy's most iconic punch.

relationships.description: Saint Charlos is the son of Saint Rosward.

evolutionMoments.description: Saint Charlos arrives at the auction with his father.

relationships.description: Saint Charlos is the older brother of Saint Shalria.

evolutionMoments.description: Saint Charlos arrives at the auction with his sister.

reveals.information: Is a Celestial Dragon, one of the World Nobles
Shows cruel and sadistic tendencies, wants to buy a mermaid to race his piranhas

keyMoments.title: Saint Rosward Arrives at Auction
keyMoments.description: Saint Rosward arrives at the Human Auctioning House with his children to participate in the slave auction.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the patriarch of the Rosward family of Celestial Dragons.

relationships.description: Saint Rosward is the father of Saint Charlos.

evolutionMoments.description: Saint Rosward arrives at the auction with his son.

relationships.description: Saint Rosward is the father of Saint Shalria.

evolutionMoments.description: Saint Rosward arrives at the auction with his daughter.

reveals.information: Is a Celestial Dragon, one of the World Nobles
Father of Saint Charlos and Saint Shalria

keyMoments.title: Saint Shalria Arrives at Auction
keyMoments.description: Saint Shalria arrives at the Human Auctioning House with her father and brother to participate in the slave auction.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the female Celestial Dragon of the Rosward family.

relationships.description: Saint Shalria is the daughter of Saint Rosward.

evolutionMoments.description: Saint Shalria arrives at the auction with her father.

relationships.description: Saint Shalria is the younger sister of Saint Charlos.

evolutionMoments.description: Saint Shalria arrives at the auction with her brother.

reveals.information: Is a Celestial Dragon, one of the World Nobles
Daughter of Saint Rosward, sister of Saint Charlos

keyMoments.title: Peterman Identified as Camie's Kidnapper
keyMoments.description: Peterman is identified as the head of the Hound Pets kidnapping gang who captured and sold Camie to the auction house.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the villain responsible for Camie's kidnapping.

reveals.information: Head of the Hound Pets kidnapping gang
Kidnapped Camie and sold her to the Human Auctioning House

keyMoments.title: Nami Decides to Buy Camie at Auction
keyMoments.description: Nami takes charge and decides the crew will purchase Camie through the auction system, declaring that money is not an issue when it comes to saving a friend.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's growth as a character, prioritizing friendship over her usual love of money, and demonstrates her leadership abilities.
keyMoments.quote: We'll get Camie back through their system. Money is not an issue.

reveals.information: Nami shows she values friendship more than money by declaring she'll spend whatever it takes to save Camie

keyMoments.title: Garp Learns of Rayleigh at Auction
keyMoments.description: Garp receives intelligence that Silvers Rayleigh is being sold at the Sabaody auction house but decides not to intervene, recognizing the danger and strategic importance of not engaging two legends while preparing for war with Whitebeard.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Garp's tactical wisdom and the weight of his responsibilities as a Marine leader during this critical time.
keyMoments.quote: He probably is selling himself to pay off a gambling debt. He is not to be underestimated just because of his age - many good men could be hurt or worse if handled the wrong way.

reveals.information: Aware of Rayleigh's scheme of selling himself to rob buyers
Chooses not to engage Rayleigh while preparing for war with Whitebeard, showing tactical restraint

keyMoments.title: X Drake Predicts War with Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: X Drake reads the news of Ace's execution and immediately predicts that Whitebeard will retaliate against the World Government, leading to a massive war.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes X Drake as an analytical thinker who understands the larger political implications of events in the One Piece world.
keyMoments.quote: There is going to be a war. Whitebeard would surely retaliate against the World Government.

reveals.information: Shows deep understanding of world politics and predicts the coming war

keyMoments.title: Kid's Philosophy on Authority
keyMoments.description: Eustass Kid observes the auction and delivers his cynical philosophy about how corrupt authority figures create criminals, showing his worldview on the nature of power.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Kid's anti-establishment philosophy and sets him up as a character who sees through the hypocrisy of the World Government.
keyMoments.quote: Compared to the callowness of greedy authority figures, the criminals of the world have much more humanity. It's because scum rule the world that new scum is born.

bounties.reason: Member of the Worst Generation with highest pre-timeskip bounty

reveals.information: Believes corrupt authority creates criminals and that criminals have more humanity than greedy leaders
